# Power Word Blind (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature with 200 hp or less

**Duration:** See text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 324

You utter a single word of power that causes a creature to become [[Blinded|blinded]], whether the creature can hear the word or not. The duration of the spell depends on the target’s current hit point total. Any creature that currently has 201 or more hit points is unaffected.


| **Hit Points** | **Duration** |
|---|---|
| 50 or less | Permanent |
| 51–100 | 1d4+1 minutes |
| 101–200 | 1d4+1 rounds |
